title: Most Frequent ID Requests
content:
It just occurred to me that it might be useful to post a sticky or something showing the most frequent requests for type ID with a sample. That might help expedite searches and possibly educate a few newbies.

 [‹ Gotham Hebrew?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015160737/http:/typophile.com/node/50451 "Go to previous forum topic") [contemporary art catalogs ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015160737/http:/typophile.com/node/50425 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Stephen Rapp

comments.content:
Hey Stephen

Isn’t there a SANS site that can... never mind, just go to HelveticArialAvantGardeFuturaUnivers dot com and that should take care of 85% of the inquiries! The rest are derivatives and unremarkable. Now, Courier and Comic Sans ... there’s a combination : )

Michael
maybe a permanent banner ad for identifont? maybe not...
My guess is just as nobody seems to read the ID forum guidelines nobody would bother to read a banner.
